Outside of parliament buildings on the streets of Moscow residents reacted to Putin's martial law order. Their feedback was mixed. You need to protect your territories. sentences.sentence: Archaeologists in the Iraqi city of Mosul have unearthed 2,700-year-old rock carvings.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: They were found during efforts to rebuild the ancient monumental Mashki Gate, bulldozed by the Islamic State group in 2016.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Some of the carvings depict war scenes from the rule of Assyrian kings in the ancient city of Nineveh.
